mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Received Donald's letter of 1 September announcing his safe arrival in England; due to the uncertainty of supplying the French market with tobacco, Mr. [William] Short will oversee the matter; Jefferson himself does business with Mr. Brown and Colonel Lewis.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1790 November 25, Philadelphia, [Pennsylvania] to Alexander Donald, London.
